title: It's as if Katarina is waiting for someone

replies.body:
Meanwhile in a tree:

{{champion:107}}: You know... Stalking your sister is kinda creepy

{{champion:91}}: What the hell are you doing here anyway?

{{champion:107}}: I'm a cat in a tree... I've been stuck here for hours

{{champion:91}}: Oh...

{{champion:107}}: ...

{{champion:91}}: ...

{{champion:107}}: So why are you stalking your sister 

{{champion:91}}: Shut up
{{champion:427}}: can you guys get off of me please

{{champion:427}}: Also if you can take the other guy with you, that would be great.

{{champion:36}}: Mundo climb trees when he pleases :p
More like Maokai

Talon is just very protective of his adopted sister. 

But not Cassiopeia apparently.
You say that... But... The Internet can inform you on different things
Well I ship it...
Ship which? I'm impartial either way
A certain Snek and mister Longsword

(Wish I could find the LoL parody, but oh well have the original)

The truth is Talon's a...

http://i.imgur.com/yat49yE.jpg?
Rachnee is pretty cool.
Rachnee is my favorite.  And I'm afraid of spiders!
Well, she's conscious about herself and is the only of the monster girls in the household that didn't put Darling in harm's way.
Ayyyy!
Nice! I like Papi myself, but Suu and Rachnee are close seconds.
Not bad
But I don't want to look up rule 34.
It's always there... *always*

{{champion:238}} Hey guys what's up?
{{champion:91}} Get out of here, lesser reworked assassin.
{{champion:238}} *Sadly walks away*
{{champion:107}} Do you really need to be so rude?
{{champion:91}} Let's just say I'm still salty over our last game of rock paper scissors.
{{champion:84}} Did anybody say... SCISSORS?!?
{{champion:91}} ...
{{champion:107}} ...
{{champion:84}} ...ok, fine, I ran away from home, please don't tell Shen where I am.
{{champion:91}} Can't he track people with his spirit powers or whatever?
{{champion:84}} Shhhhh... *Throws smoke bomb and falls off tree*
{{champion:107}} Well, that was certainly... interesting.
*Distant thud*
{{champion:105}} More like... Fishy.
{{champion:245}} *Comes out of time portal* Ooh, a snack!
{{champion:105}} Wha-?
{{champion:245}} *Grabs Fizz and disappears back into time portal*
{{champion:91}} ...this is getting out of hand.
{{champion:29}} Tell me about it. There's nothing to eat here.
{{champion:107}} Ughhhh... your stench is clogging my nostrils...
{{champion:35}} So why are we stalking red head there?
{{champion:91}} I'm going to kill all of you.
{{champion:55}} ? *Turns around*
*Everyone scatters*

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=spKrnlTO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-19T20:05:27.199+0000)
>
> Meanwhile in a tree:
> 
> {{champion:107}}: You know... Stalking your sister is kinda creepy
> 
> {{champion:91}}: What the hell are you doing here anyway?

http://img1.reactor.cc/pics/post/LoL-Gif-League-of-Legends-%D1%84%D1%8D%D0%BD%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%BC%D1%8B-gif-1405351.gif

{{champion:107}}: ... nothing.
They aren't related you know. he works for her dad.
I know this lore, but they're perceived as brother and sister a lot. He's seen as the adopted brother

I've always seen him as the father's secret weapon. He'd just sit silently on the grandfather clock in the corner of the general's office (the corner that is left of the door so no one sees him). At dinner he'd move to the chandelier while kat, cass, and the general and eating normally.
https://66.media.tumblr.com/62701c6798d33fe412a385d70a11e194/tumblr_mzddzivFCo1r4mr8ho7_1280.jpg

Read this:

http://imgur.com/a/m7QwM
http://24.media.tumblr.com/eb3602888826558eaa0969bbedaa3772/tumblr_mzddzivFCo1r4mr8ho5_1280.jpg

{{champion:91}} " F*CK YOU, I AM THE NIGHT!"

{{champion:55}} "more like the "creed" >_>"

{{champion:91}} "SILENCE! I am a completely original character damn it X("

{{champion:91}}: (Now I will catch her in the act of treason)

{{champion:55}}: Oh, so you showed up after all... I was getting worried <3

{{champion:432}}: Bwaaaaaaarrrrgggg

{{champion:55}}: *giggle* you always know just what to say.

{{champion:91}} (...WTF?!)

{{champion:107}} *psst, go find your own peeping tree* >:(

{{champion:91}} .--.

waiting for that D

D as in Demacia{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
http://www.reactiongifs.com/wp-content/gallery/yes/yesjacknicholson.gif
She is actually fully aware of Talon's presence.  Hell if she's not aware of his, she sure as hell is aware that LeBlanc is hiding in wait.  Look closely.  She's about to get jumped by the Black Rose
And don't forget {{champion:29}} and {{champion:28}}. They're there too.
{{champion:17}} too. Incoming butt slap
Where's the LeBlanc?

> [{quoted}](name=WhiskerWow,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=spKrnlTO,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2016-10-20T02:54:58.330+0000)
>
> Where's the LeBlanc?

Behind the trees. Her and the clone.  They're camouflaged and blend in with the background. You have to search closely, but they are there.
where...? i dont see anything except green
I've only spotted the clone.  Where's the original?

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=spKrnlTO,comment-id=0004000100000000,timestamp=2016-10-20T14:30:25.509+0000)
>
> I've only spotted the clone.  Where's the original?

They both look alike, honestly.

One about 4 treets to the left.  And then one just a tad to the right further in the background.
http://i.imgur.com/GiapkPg.gif?noredirect
Shes waiting for them to get close so she can ult

Who else saw LB in the background?
Probs Kat's chaperone.
On an othe rnot so distant tree  {{champion:99}} stands still with the staff as a sniper rifle
She's waiting for a caravan to pick her up because she's a whooo..... yeah that's enough
